name: Elevator VR
storyline: You have boarded the elevator. The elevator is a machine which will go to designated places. The elevator is in motion. The elevator travels the designated route. The elevator is not sentient. The elevator does not care about your life, needs, wants, or desires. The elevator neither has hopes nor cares about yours. The elevator is an analogue machine. The elevator has cables and pulleys. The pulleys control its speed and direction. The elevator button suggests what the elevator should do next. The elevator does what it wants next. It is the elevator. The elevator is, and the elevator does.
summary: Experience the journey of riding an elevator.
